title: Directorate of Operations (CIA)
summary: The Directorate of Operations (DO), less formally called the Clandestine Service,[1] is one of the smallest components of the US Central Intelligence Agency.[1] It was known as the Directorate of Plans from 1951 to 1973; as the Directorate of Operations from 1973 to 2005; and as the National Clandestine Service (NCS) from 2005 to 2015.[2]
